title: Packers fall to Eagles in defensive bout
content: If you're a fan of offense, Monday night in Green Bay was ugly. If defense is your thing, it was a thing of beauty.

title: Kelly files suit, says LSU seeking 'for cause' firing
content: In a legal filing Monday, Brian Kelly's attorneys say LSU has taken the position that it has not "formally terminated" Kelly as the Tigers' football coach and is now seeking to fire him "for cause" and potentially avoid paying his full $54 million buyout.

title: New Eagles LB Phillips 'showed out' in 10-7 win
content: A week after being traded from Miami to Philadelphia, new Eagles linebacker Jaelan Phillips played 52 snaps, racked up seven pressures, six tackles, two quarterback hits and a fumble recovery in his club's 10-7 win over the Packers on Monday night.

title: Love: Packers offense 'letting the defense down'
content: A strong effort from the Packers defense Monday night coincided with one of the worst offensive games in Jordan Love's three seasons as the starter, prompting the QB to remark, "You feel like as an offense you're letting the defense down."

title: 'Fire Nico' chants overshadow Flagg's career night
content: "Fire Nico!" chants -- a reference to embattled Mavericks GM Nico Harrison -- rang out in the fourth quarter in Dallas on Monday night, overshadowing No. 1 pick Cooper Flagg's season-high 26-point performance.

title: A's Kurtz, Braves' Baldwin named rookies of year
content: Athletics first baseman Nick Kurtz was selected the American League Rookie of the Year on Monday night after hitting 36 home runs with 98 RBIs in 117 games, while catcher Drake Baldwin of the Atlanta Braves took home the National League's top honors.

title: Pistons' Cunningham has 46 on 45 shots in OT win
content: Pistons star Cade Cunningham scored 46 points on 45 shots in a wild overtime win vs. the Wizards. His 31 misses were the most since the 1976-77 merger.

title: Heat steal OT win with buzzer-beating lob play
content: The Miami Heat sealed a thrilling 140-138 victory over the Cavaliers off a brilliantly designed out-of-bounds play that ended in an Andrew Wiggins alley-oop dunk.

title: McDermott backs Brady; not eyeing Daboll for staff
content: Bills coach Sean McDermott said Monday he was "fully confident" in offensive coordinator Joe Brady and his staff following a blowout loss to the Dolphins in Week 10.

title: Real or not? Early NBA trends that are either here to stay or will fade quickly
content: From the Bulls' hot start to the onslaught of free throws, ESPN analyst Kevin Pelton explores which early-season trends are real or not.

title: Wetzel: Feds are the best hope to police sports betting's wild west
content: In the end, the fear of being busted is about the only universal deterrent. Prison is a powerful disincentive.

title: Updated NFL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus each team's non-QB MVP at midseason
content: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings ahead of Week 11. Plus, we picked every team's MVP -- not including quarterbacks.

title: MLB Awards Week predictions, results: Kurtz, Baldwin named Rookies of the Year
content: Baseball's best players and managers of 2025 are collecting their hardware, starting with a pair of rookies from the A's and Braves.

title: Inside an unbelievable $241M week for Austin Reaves and the Lakers
content: The Lakers' fifth-year guard now sits at the center of two major NBA storylines: Helping the team win enough to convince LeBron James to stay in L.A., but playing so well that it might cost the franchise nearly $250M dollars to keep him.

title: The Philadelphia 76ers, Ghost and the most remarkable 16th man in the NBA
content: Eagle screeches, slot machines, glass breaks and more: Introducing the ghost behind all these good vibes in Philadelphia.

title: Bracketology: Houston claims No. 1 overall seed, Georgetown cracks the field
content: The Cougars top the first in-season edition of our projections. Here are the 67 other teams that made the cut.

title: Is UNC back?! Judging six opening week overreactions
content: From the strength of this freshman class to statement wins, these are conclusions we're drawing early.

title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: UConn remains No. 1, USC climbs
content: The first in-season women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.

title: Top 100 prospects for the 2026 NBA draft: Peterson, Dybantsa or Boozer at No. 1?
content: Which top prospects lead our first rankings? Who needs to make their mark before June's draft? Here's our 100 big board for the 2026 class.

title: An NBA fan's guide to college basketball: 10 teams with the most prospects
content: Duke is loaded with talent. Here are nine other teams NBA fans should be watching this college season.

title: NHL trendspotting: Which first-month shock teams will stay red hot or ice cold?
content: Who has overachieved or underachieved in the first month, and will it continue? Here are four teams in each category.

title: How coaching carousel impacts recruits: 10 key commits who could flip﻿
content: Some high-profile recruiting classes lost their coaches, leaving big questions about players who could flip.

title: What's at stake for every player in the WNBA labor battle
content: From stars with millions in off-court endorsements to those making the minimum, every WNBA player stands to gain in the new CBA.

title: How Fleetwood Mac and the USC marching band went from a missed phone call to collaborating on 'Tusk'
content: The idea initially sounded so far-fetched band directors thought it was a prank. But the collaboration became a sensation.

title: Barnwell: The AFC is shifting, but the four new challengers to the conference throne are all flawed
content: We thought the Bills, Chiefs and Ravens would dominate the AFC again this season. But four teams have risen from the pack to challenge -- and possibly pass -- them.

title: Are Chelsea meeting expectations? 9 stats that explain their confusing season
content: Success and failure is obvious for every Premier League team ... except Chelsea. How should we make sense of their season so far?

title: Are you not entertained? Barça aren't Europe's best, but they're the best to watch
content: While Barcelona is not perfect, they are the most entertaining team in Europe, and that's worth celebrating.

title: Why PSG are in trouble ahead of Manchester United UWCL trip
content: Paris Saint-Germain were expecting to push on and compete in the UWCL, instead they are struggling. What's going on in Paris?

title: MLS Cup playoffs Round 1 talking points: Messi, favorites move on
content: Were there any upsets in Round 1 of the MLS Cup playoffs? Not really, but that didn't mean the best-of-three series were short on drama.

title: Boxing divisional rankings: Vergil Ortiz Jr. knocks Erickson Lubin out of top 10
content: Vergil Ortiz Jr. needed less than two rounds to retain the WBC interim junior middleweight title. Here are the latest ESPN rankings in all weight classes.

title: Highlights from John Cena's farewell tour
content: Here are the best moments from John Cena's "The Last Time is Now" farewell tour, which kicked off at Intuit Dome on Jan. 6.

title: 'Hunt down each & every culprit': Amit Shah says Delhi blast culprits to face 'full wrath of agencies'
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah has ordered a relentless pursuit to apprehend all individuals involved in the devastating i20 car blast near the Red Fort. The high-intensity explosion claimed at least 12 lives and injured 30, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Defence Minister Rajnath Singh vowing that perpetrators will face severe justice.

title: Delhi blast: UP doc was tasked with forming Jaish's women wing; Pulwama link emerges
content: A woman doctor, Dr. Shaheen Sayeed, is a key suspect in a terror investigation involving a "white-collar" network. The probe intensified after a deadly car blast near Delhi's Red Fort, linked to the Pakistan-based Jaish-e-Mohammed. Eight individuals, including three doctors, were arrested with significant explosives seized.

title: U19 triangular series: Why Suryavanshi 'not considered' for selection? BCCI clarifies
content: The BCCI has announced India A U19 and India B U19 squads for an upcoming triangular series featuring Afghanistan U19. Vaibhav Suryavanshi was omitted as he is selected for the ACC Rising Stars Asia Cup, while Ayush Mhatre is unavailable due to Ranji Trophy participation. The tri series begins on November 17 in Bengaluru.

title: Vibe coding: Meta’s AI chief has advice for teens: Says they should spend time on..
content: Meta's Chief AI Officer, Alexandr Wang, urges teenagers to master AI tools, comparing the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding'—hands-on experimentation with AI—to gain a significant advantage in the future economy. This approach emphasizes rapid learning through prompting and refining AI outputs.

title: Delhi blast: With three occupants in i20 car, does it rule out a fidayeen attack?
content: Security agencies are probing a Red Fort blast, questioning if a fidayeen attack is plausible with three occupants in the car. Initial theories pointed to a suicide mission, but multiple individuals and CCTV footage suggest otherwise. Investigators are exploring accidental detonation or a botched transport of explosives to another target.

title: Rizwan's Pakistan captaincy sack: Afridi breaks silence - 'Good human'
content: Shaheen Shah Afridi revealed he accepted Pakistan's ODI captaincy after Mohammad Rizwan voluntarily stepped down. Afridi emphasized a collaborative approach, seeking advice from all, including former captains, and stressed collective team responsibility for improvement. He aims to lead Pakistan in the 2027 World Cup, backing both in-form and struggling players.

title: AI coding for everyone: Google Brain founder says it’s important to learn coding; explains why
content: Google Brain founder Andrew Ng advocates for 'vibe coding,' urging professionals across industries to leverage AI tools for development. He emphasizes that AI-assisted coding lowers the barrier to entry, boosting productivity and creativity for everyone, not just engineers. This shift is also highlighted by industry leaders and reflected in job requirements.

title: New season, old Delhi: Sr selector lands in US mid-season
content: Delhi cricket is in crisis mode — on-field failures mirror the chaos off it. With the DDCA mired in infighting, unauthorised league scandals, and selection controversies, Delhi’s Ranji team has slumped to a new low as they were hammered by Jammu & Kashmir at home in the Ranji Trophy. Poor preparation, lack of direction under coach Sarandeep Singh, and internal politics has left the Delhi team in a lurch.

title: Pakistan suicide blast: Car explodes near Islamabad court; 12 killed
content: A suicide blast in Islamabad's Kacheri area killed at least 12 people and injured several others on Tuesday. Authorities have sealed the site and launched an investigation, recovering body parts believed to be of the suspected bomber. The incident follows a separate explosion at the Supreme Court cafeteria, raising security concerns.

title: ‘Don’t have notifications’: JPMorgan chief ignores most texts; keeps phone off at work
content: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon, despite leading a massive bank, limits his phone use at work, turning off notifications and ignoring texts unless from his children. He prioritizes focus in meetings, believing distractions hinder engagement. Dimon also advocates for US schools to evolve, integrating crucial skills like coding and cybersecurity to prepare students for the modern workforce.

title: 'Amit Shah should resign': Oppn targets Centre over Delhi blast; BJP hits back
content: Opposition parties have fiercely criticized the Centre following a deadly car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort. Leaders demanded Home Minister Amit Shah's resignation, citing alleged intelligence failures and past terror incidents. They questioned the government's ability to ensure national security, while the BJP accused them of politicizing a tragedy and undermining investigations.

title: Patrick & Brittany Mahomes celebrate with custom ‘his and hers’ fitness bands
content: Patrick and Brittany Mahomes have partnered with WHOOP, launching custom "His & Hers" fitness bands. This collaboration highlights their commitment to personal performance and wellness, extending their business ventures beyond sports and into technology. The wearable tracks key health metrics, offering scientifically-backed insights for users.

title: Bihar elections: How accurate have predictions been in the past; who came closest to the mark?
content: Exit polls for the Bihar Assembly elections are set to be released following the conclusion of the final phase of voting. These surveys offer an early indication of voter preferences, though past predictions for Bihar have significantly deviated from actual results. The article highlights the inaccuracies of exit polls in both the 2020 and 2015 Bihar Assembly elections.

title: The Bartlett story — a swimmer-turned-pacer; Virat Kohli's conqueror
content: Xavier Bartlett, a former champion swimmer, has made a remarkable transition to cricket, impressing in his fifth ODI by dismantling India's top order. Mentored by Andy Bichel, Bartlett's ability to swing the new ball consistently and his athletic prowess, honed in the pool, make him a bright prospect for Australian cricket across all formats.

title: Exclusive - Bigg Boss 19's Abhishek Bajaj calls cheating allegations by ex-wife 'baseless'
content: Abhishek Bajaj, recently eliminated from Bigg Boss 19, has strongly refuted cheating allegations made by his ex-wife, Akanksha Jindal. He labeled her a "social parasite and fame digger," asserting their divorce was mutual and amicable. Bajaj emphasized his loyalty in relationships and friendships, urging viewers to judge him by his actions within the house.

title: Veterans Day 2025: What’s open, what’s closed, and how the US will observe holiday
content: Veterans Day 2025 falls on Tuesday, November 11, honoring military service. Most government offices, including post offices and DMVs, will close. Banks will be shut, but ATMs and online services remain accessible. Retailers and restaurants will largely operate, many offering veteran discounts. UPS and FedEx will have modified schedules. The next federal holidays are Thanksgiving and Christmas.

title: Pakistan bowler Naseem Shah's home attacked; heavy firing reported
content: Pakistan fast bowler Naseem Shah's family home in Lower Dir was fired upon by unknown assailants on November 10, though no family members were harmed. Police are investigating the incident. Naseem remains with the national team for their upcoming ODI series against Sri Lanka, a crucial part of their T20 World Cup preparations.

title: Delhi car blast: Who was Md Umar? The J&K doctor driving the car that exploded near Red Fort
content: A Kashmiri doctor, Mohammad Umar, is suspected of driving the car used in the Delhi Red Fort Metro Station parking blast. Police sources indicate a link to a Faridabad terror module where explosives were seized. CCTV footage shows a masked man in the vehicle. Umar, who is absconding, is believed to be associated with the Jaish-e-Mohammad terror group.

title: Microsoft techie laid off: Calls it a green light; 5 career comeback tips
content: Tatiana Teppoeva found liberation after a Microsoft layoff. She launched her own company, teaching executives presence. Her journey shows how job loss can spark career change. Professionals can use severance for skills development and rebrand themselves. Embracing a portfolio career or side hustle offers new paths. Shifting from victim to architect of one's career is key.

title: How ESA plans to make astronaut food from thin air for Moon and Mars missions
content: Europe's space agency is pioneering a groundbreaking project, HOBI-WAN, to generate protein from gases like hydrogen and carbon dioxide in space. This innovative technology, developed with Solar Foods, could provide astronauts with a sustainable food source, reducing reliance on Earth resupply missions for long-duration Moon and Mars journeys. The experiment aims to prove the viability of gas-based fermentation in microgravity.

title: 'Respond within 2 weeks': SC seeks EC reply on pleas challenging SIR
content: The Supreme Court has given the Election Commission two weeks to respond to petitions challenging the Special Intensive Revision exercise in West Bengal and Tamil Nadu. Parties like DMK, Congress, and TMC have filed these pleas, accusing the EC of a "malicious exercise." AIADMK has been permitted to join the case in support of the SIR exercise in Tamil Nadu.

title: Delhi car blast: New video surfaces showing explosion near Red Fort area; watch
content: A devastating car explosion near Delhi's Red Fort metro station, captured on CCTV, has claimed at least 12 lives and injured many. Authorities suspect a Kashmiri doctor, Mohammad Umar, linked to a terror module, drove the vehicle. Police are investigating the incident under UAPA, reviewing footage to track the suspect's movements.

title: Delhi air quality worsens, schools go hybrid; GRAP Stage III curbs enforced
content: Delhi schools are shifting to a hybrid learning model for students up to Class 5 due to soaring pollution levels. The decision follows the activation of Stage III anti-pollution measures as the city's Air Quality Index reached 425. This move ensures educational continuity while prioritizing student health amidst hazardous air quality.

title: ‘Cross-border terror’: India tells UNSC to enforce zero-tolerance; remark after-Delhi blast
content: India has informed the United Nations Security Council about its long-standing struggle with cross-border terrorism. This comes after a deadly explosion near the Red Fort metro station in Delhi. India highlighted the dangers of illicit arms trafficking to terrorist groups. The country urged consistent enforcement of arms embargoes. Effective international cooperation is deemed critical to combat this threat.

title: Delhi blast: Red Fort closed for 3 days; Lal Quila Metro, Chandni Chowk shut
content: Delhi remains on high alert after a powerful explosion near the Red Fort killed eight and injured 24. Key areas, including the Red Fort and Lal Qila Metro Station, are closed for investigation. The car involved was traced to Pulwama, and police are examining CCTV footage and conducting raids.

title: ‘Dharmendra is recovering’: Sunny Deol’s team clarifies
content: After a brief stint in the hospital, veteran actor Dharmendra found himself at the center of unfounded death rumors flooding social media. His wife, the iconic Hema Malini, swiftly dismissed these claims, referring to them as deeply hurtful. Dharmendra's team has reassured everyone that he is on the mend, much to the relief of his loving family and dedicated fans.

title: Fitness influencer Hayley McNeff’s cause of death revealed
content: Champion bodybuilder and fitness influencer Hayley McNeff died unexpectedly at 37 on August 8, 2025, in Sudbury, Massachusetts. Official reports revealed her cause of death was acute intoxication from a mix of substances, ruled an accident. Her passing highlights unseen struggles within the fitness community.

title: 2026 CWG: King's Baton Relay reaches Delhi; Ahmedabad next on programme
content: The King's Baton Relay for the 2026 Glasgow Games arrives in New Delhi on November 11, marking its journey across Commonwealth nations. After a two-day display, it heads to Ahmedabad, which is in the running to host the 2030 CWG. The Baton, designed by Aaquib Wani, will be showcased at DLF Avenue Saket.

title: GRAP 3 activated in Delhi-NCR: Know what’s banned and what’s allowed amid 'severe' pollution
content: Delhi's air quality has plunged to 'severe', triggering Stage III of the Graded Response Action Plan. This means a halt on most construction, a ban on older vehicles, and restrictions on industries. Essential projects are exempt if dust control is maintained. Younger students will shift to online classes, while the Metro adds services to encourage public transport use.

title: 'Urgent help needed': Sumit Nagal's visa plea to China
content: India's top tennis player, Sumit Nagal, has publicly appealed to Chinese authorities after his visa for the Australian Open Asia-Pacific Wildcard Play-off in Chengdu was reportedly rejected without explanation. The 28-year-old tagged the Chinese Ambassador and Embassy spokesperson on X, seeking urgent intervention for his participation in the crucial tournament.

title: IND vs SA: Security beefed up at Eden Gardens after Delhi car blast
content: Following a fatal blast near Delhi, security has been significantly heightened across Kolkata and at Eden Gardens for the India-South Africa Test. A three-tier security cordon is in place at the stadium, with intensified checks and plainclothes officers deployed. Key city zones and team hotels are also under enhanced surveillance, prompting a review of crowd management plans.

title: Viral moment: Lionel Messi photobombs couple's romantic dance in Barcelona - watch
content: A couple's romantic video in Barcelona took an unexpected turn when football legend Lionel Messi casually walked into the frame. This viral moment occurred just hours after Messi's emotional visit to Camp Nou, his former home, fueling fan speculation about a potential return to his boyhood club.

title: 'Will dig deep into roots of conspiracy': PM Modi's warning from Bhutan after Delhi blast
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, speaking from Bhutan, expressed deep sorrow over the Delhi car blast and vowed that those responsible will be brought to justice. He assured that agencies are investigating the conspiracy and will get to the bottom of it. Defence minister Rajnath Singh also extended condolences and promised swift and thorough action, assuring the nation that perpetrators will not be spared.

title: ‘Envy and greed walk…’: Did Buffett take a dig at Musk’s $1 trillion pay package?
content: Warren Buffett subtly criticized soaring CEO pay, citing a 'race' fueled by envy and greed, particularly after Tesla's $1 trillion package for Elon Musk and Rivian's similarly structured offer for RJ Scaringe.

title: Dharmendra-Hema's unusual marriage, blended family: Why Hema chose not to live with Dharmendra
content: Bollywood's iconic couple Dharmendra and Hema Malini's love story defied societal norms. Married in 1980, Hema chose to live separately from Dharmendra, who was already married, prioritizing her happiness and dignity. Their unconventional union, despite public scrutiny, endured, showcasing a unique blend of love and acceptance.

title: Faridabad terror bust: Was Al-Falah University's lab used for making RDX?
content: A major counterterrorism operation has busted a transnational terror module. The arrest of a Kashmiri medical professor led to the seizure of nearly 2,900kg of explosives and weapons. Investigators uncovered a network embedded in academic and professional circles. The module was allegedly linked to Jaish-e-Mohammed and Ansar Ghazwat-ul-Hind. Several arrests have been made across multiple states.

title: MLB trade rumors: Blue Jays eye $450 million Cubs All-Star to boost rotation
content: Toronto Blue Jays are reportedly eyeing a blockbuster offseason acquisition of four-time All-Star outfielder Kyle Tucker.  Sources suggest Toronto could be the 'perfect fit' for the highly-rated talent, who is expected to command a massive contract.  This potential move aims to bolster the Blue Jays' already potent lineup and propel them towards championship contention.

title: Bihar Election 2025 Phase 2 Voting LIVE Updates: Bihar Records Highest Turnout Of 67.14% Till 5 PM
content: Voter enthusiasm continued to mark the second and final phase of the Bihar Assembly elections, with an impressive 60.40% turnout recorded across the constituencies until 3 pm.

title: Record Turnout In Bihar Election, Test For Nitish Kumar's Cabinet: 10 Points
content: Phase 2 of assembly polls in Bihar today saw the highest ever turnout, with over 60% voting till 5.30 pm. Voting is being held on 122 seats, from where a chunk of Chief Minister Nitish Kumar's cabinet is seeking re-election.

title: Bihar Election Poll Of Exit Poll Results 2025 Live Updates: 3 Exit Polls Predict NDA Sweep In Bihar, Poor Show By Prashant Kishor's Party
content: Voting in the second and final phase of the Bihar assembly elections has ended. Now it's time to find out what the exit polls have predicted for the state.

title: Images Show Myanmar Scam Hub Largely Standing Despite Crackdown
content: A declared military crackdown has left some destruction at a major scam compound in Myanmar, satellite images analysed by AFP show, but most buildings are still standing in pictures taken up to Sunday.

title: Opinion: Opinion | 'PhD' Handlers To Faridabad 'Doctors', How 'White-Collar' Terrorism Isn't New
content: From ISIS chief Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi, who held a PhD, to Al-Qaeda's Ayman al-Zawahiri, a surgeon, and Laden, a civil engineering graduate - some of the world's most extremist leaders have come from classrooms, universities and privileged backgrounds.

title: 'Come Home, Hidma': Mother Of India's Most Wanted Maoist To Son
content: In a scene few thought possible in one of India's most conflict-scarred regions, Chhattisgarh Deputy Chief Minister and Home Minister Vijay Sharma rode a motorcycle deep into the forests of Poorvarti village.

title: 'She Betrayed Me': Man Stabs Woman At Bus Stop, Wipes Hands On Her Scarf
content: One-sided love turned into brutal violence when a 23-year-old woman was murdered in the middle of the road in Madhya Pradesh's Balaghat district on Tuesday.

title: Video: Heated Exchange Between BJP MLA, Party Official During 'Unity March
content: A 'Unity March' organised by the BJP in Bilaspur on Tuesday to mark the 150th birth anniversary of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel, India's Iron Man, briefly turned contentious after a heated argument broke out between a BJP leader and party official.

title: Bhopal Model Death: Post-Mortem Reveals Pregnancy, Family Alleges Murder
content: A 21-year-old model, Khushboo Verma (Ahirwar), was found dead under suspicious circumstances early Monday morning, sending shockwaves through Bhopal's fashion circuit.

title: Delhi Suicide Attack Suspect Went Underground 3 Days Before Bombing Near Red Fort
content: Three days before the suicide bombing attack near Delhi's Red Fort, the suspect Dr Umar Nabi had switched off his phone and his family had been unable to reach him.

title: Top Court Concerned After Kerala Students 'Coerced' To Speak Hindi In Delhi
content: "We are one country", the Supreme Court asserted on Tuesday while expressing concern over a recent incident in Delhi where two students from Kerala were allegedly assaulted by police and locals near the Red Fort, "coerced" to speak Hindi.

title: "Why Apprehensive": Top Court Raps Tamil Nadu On SIR, Gives Notice To Poll Body
content: An exasperated Supreme Court questioned today why the critics of the voter roll revision exercise are so "apprehensive" about it.

title: New CCTV Footage Shows Delhi Suicide Bomber At Toll Plaza, Wearing Mask
content: As investigators trace the journey of the Hyundai i20 used in the Delhi bombing from Faridabad to the Red Fort area, new CCTV footage has emerged showing the car at the Badarpur toll plaza.

title: Six Ancient Roman-Era Statues Stolen From National Museum In Syria
content: Thieves broke into the national museum in the Syrian capital and stole several ancient statues dating back to the Roman era, officials said Tuesday.

title: 'Struggled To Ensure He Gets Education': Family Of Delhi Blast Case Accused
content: The family of the man suspected to be involved in the Delhi blast near Red Fort metro station said they cannot believe that he could be involved in terror activities.

title: 'Flash, Fire And Blood': Survivors Recount Horror Of Delhi Red Fort Blast
content: "People were lying on the road, some bleeding, some not moving at all. There was blood everywhere. We saw death from up close," said Ram Pratap, lying on a hospital bed with his right arm tightly bandaged, recalling the Red Fort blast.

title: Delhi Blast Live Updates: Anti-Terror Agency NIA Takes Over Case
content: Delhi Blast Live Updates: The blast near Red Fort, in which nine people died, is being probed as a terror attack, with the Delhi Police invoking UAPA (Unlawful Activities Prevention Act) sections.

title: "Her Behaviour Was Strange": Professor Recalls Terror Accused Doctor
content: Shahin Shahid, a doctor, till recently would have passed as just another professional, going about doing her work. But no one who worked with her had the faintest idea who she really was.

title: CCTV Video Shows People Running In Fear After Delhi Blast
content: A deadly blast near Red Fort in New Delhi on Monday evening killed nine and injured 20. At 6:52 pm, a slow-moving Hyundai i20 exploded at a traffic stop near the Red Fort Metro Station leaving mutilated bodies and damaged cars scattered in the area.

title: "Woh Chala Gaya": Delhi Blast Victim Supported Family Of 4, Sister's Kids
content: "Aaj woh chala hi gaya (Today, he is gone)," wailed one of 35-year-old Jumman Mohammed's family members at the mortuary where the Delhi suicide blast victim's body was kept.

title: Early bets for Week 11: Bengals and Dolphins to cover, plus an MVP pick
content: What lines offered immediate value once odds came out? Here are three early bets and a futures wager to track.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Brighton's Minteh
content: Could Liverpool end up signing Yankuba Minteh from Brighton & Hove Albion? Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Local Body Polls 2025: From majority to mayhem, UDF’s uneasy tryst with Thrikkakara municipality
content: Though the UDF was the single largest front in the three elections held since the erstwhile panchayat, a Congress stronghold, was elevated into a municipality, it rarely enjoyed a smooth tenure, except in 2010 when it secured a simple majority

title: Delhi blast draws messages of condemnation
content: Israeli Foreign Minister Gideon Sa’ar, the heads of state and Ambassadors of several countries, the Taliban of Afghanistan, have condemned the blast

title: Madras High Court directs T.N. government to submit second draft of SOP for political rallies on November 21
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan say the suggestions of TVK should also be considered before placing the second draft before the court

title: Syrma SGS to set up India’s largest PCB manufacturing unit in Andhra Pradesh
content: Electronics major to invest ₹1,595 crore in a multi-layer PCB facility near Naidupeta, creating over 2,100 high-skill jobs; Nara Lokesh says the project reflects global confidence in the State’s speed and business-friendly ecosystem

title: Delhi Red Fort Blast: Taxi driver, cosmetics shop owner identified among 13 victims
content: A case has been registered under the Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act and the Explosives Act, and multiple raids are being conducted by Delhi Police as part of the ongoing investigation

title: Trinamool, BJP vie to pay homage on Nandigram Shaheed Diwas, engage in war of words
content: While LoP Suvendu Adhikari claimed it was a ‘mistake’ to support CM Mamata Banerjee earlier, Trinamool MP Abhishek Banerjee highlighted the “changing face of oppression”, from Left Front to the Centre’s BJP government

title: Bihar exit poll LIVE updates: Exit polls predict Nitish Kumar's return
content: The election is held in 122 Assembly constituencies spread across about 20 districts. 1,302 candidates are in the fray

title: Health department issues strict guidelines to protect schoolchildren from snakebites
content: The new directives make it mandatory for schools to undertake detailed safety audits and maintain full emergency readiness. All schools must train staff to provide first aid for snakebites, maintain updated contact lists of hospitals with anti-snake venom (ASV) stocks.

title: Telangana releases ₹12.99 crore as immediate assistance to families hit by cyclone Montha
content: The Government has earlier announced ex-gratia to next kin of the families of those who died under the impact of the heavy rains

title: Fire at Thiruvananthapuram fireworks unit leaves three injured, one critical
content: The makeshift thatched shed was used for manufacturing ‘ola padakkam’ (leaf crackers) for nearly five years.

title: Delhi Red Fort blast: Case handed over to anti-terrorism agency NIA
content: This is a clear indication that the blast, which has so far claimed 12 lives, is being considered by the government as an act of terror, as the NIA is mandated to probe terror cases only

title: BJP’s Sreelekha and CPI(M)’s V. Joy in a political tit-for-tat over the former DGP’s suitability as a councillor candidate
content: In response to Mr. Joy’s remarks that the ex-DGP was ill-suited to understand and respond to the travails and tribulations of ordinary people, Ms. Sreelekha attributed his comment to a ‘fear of failure at the hustings’ and noted that she had volunteered to clean neighbourhoods and support civic society during COVID-19

title: Stray dog bites four morning walkers on Thiruvananthapuram museum premises
content: This incident underscores ongoing concerns about stray dogs at the museum, exacerbated by food waste left by visitors, prompting calls for more effective management measures.

title: Seventeen FIRs lodged against mosque caretakers, clerics over use of loudspeakers in Uttar Pradesh's Ballia
content: ‘The cases were lodged across various police stations as part of a district-wide drive against the use of high-decibel loudspeakers in religious places,’ says SP

title: T.N. CM Stalin flags off 80 pink patrol vehicles to strengthen women’s safety in urban areas
content: The new vehicles will be used for patrolling in cities such as Tambaram, Avadi, Salem, Coimbatore, Tiruppur, Tiruchi, Tirunelveli, and Madurai

title: Andesri’s funeral held in Ghatkesar; 20,000 copies of ‘Nippula Vagu’ to be available in Telangana libraries
content: A decision would be taken to include ‘Jaya Jayahe Telangana’ in curriculum. Telangana government seeks Padma Shri for Ande Shri

title: Faridabad explosives seizure: Family of arrested doctor denies terror links
content: Azad Shakeel said his family, who are farmers by occupation, have been targeted by stone-pelters in the past for being nationalists

title: Four inmates booked after video of dance party inside Bengaluru Central prison goes viral
content: On November 9, a video showing inmates dancing to loud music, banging plastic cans and plates as makeshift drums, and allegedly consuming liquor along with snacks, went viral on social media

title: Those responsible for Delhi blast will not be spared: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh
content: ‘I wish to assure my fellow citizens that the country's leading investigative agencies are conducting a swift and thorough inquiry into the incident,’ says Defence Minister

title: Native of Uttar Pradesh’s Amroha among 13 killed in Delhi Red Fort blast
content: Ashok Kumar was living with his family in a rented house at Jagatpuri, New Delhi, and worked as a conductor with the Delhi Transport Corporation (DTC) that provides bus services in the national capital, police said.

title: Nuapada Assembly bypoll: Over 65% voter turnout recorded till 3 p.m., two poll officers suspended
content: Polling has been continuing since 7 a.m. across all 358 booths, including 47 identified as sensitive, amid tight security arrangements

title: TMC MP Mahua Moitra criticises Amit Shah over Delhi Red Fort blast
content: India needs a capable Home Minister not a full-time Hate Campaign Minister, says TMC MP Mahua Moitra in a post on X

title: Delhi Red Fort blast: All responsible will be brought to justice, says PM Modi
content: Attending the 70th birth anniversary of the fourth King of Bhutan, Modi announced a slew of projects to strengthen India-Bhutan ties

title: Nithari killings: Supreme Court acquits prime accused Surendra Koli in last pending case, orders his release
content: The top court had earlier remarked that it would amount to a “travesty of justice” to uphold Sureder Koli’s conviction in the sole pending case

title: Two watchmen hacked to death in a temple at Devadanam near Rajapalayam
content: The police suspect that the robbers would have hacked the watchmen to death when they resisted their attempt to break open the hundial. The crime came to light when the temple was opened for the morning puja on Tuesday

title: Akola riots case: CJI-led Bench stays Supreme Court order to form SIT with equal Hindu, Muslim officers
content: Recently, a review filed by the State had led to a split opinion between Justice Kumar and Justice Satish Chandra Sharma, with the former upholding the direction while the latter changing his mind

title: Ghatsila Assembly bypoll: 54.08% turnout till 1 p.m.
content: While the JMM has put all its efforts into winning the bypoll and strengthening its credibility among the tribal masses, the Opposition BJP is trying to discredit the government by wresting the seat.

title: West Bengal Police bust ₹317-crore cyber fraud racket, conduct raids at businessman Pawan Ruia's premises
content: ‘A meticulous investigation unveiled the direct involvement of a cyber fraud. Over 1,379 complainants across West Bengal and other parts of India were cheated of approximately ₹317 crore,’ says police

title: Enhanced security put in place in Thiruvananthapuram airport
content: Passengers are advised to arrive ahead of their scheduled departure and cooperate with security personnel

title: Nuapada Assembly bypoll in Odisha records 14.99% voter turnout till 9 a.m.
content: Voting began at 7 a.m. in all 358 polling booths, including 47 sensitive ones, amid tight security arrangements

title: Tarn Taran Assembly bypoll: Over 36% voting turnout as of 1 p.m.
content: Voter turnout in the Tarn Taran Assembly bypoll reached 11% by 9 a.m. on November 11, 2025, as residents cast votes to fill the seat left vacant by AAP MLA Kashmir Singh Sohal’s death

title: Anta Assembly bypoll: More than 47% voter turnout by 1 p.m.
content: The bypoll, viewed as a prestige contest for both Chief Minister Bhajanlal Sharma and senior Congress leader Ashok Gehlot, is also the first electoral test for the BJP government since taking office last year

title: Bihar Assembly Polls 2025: Phase 2 constituencies and electors
content: The second and final phase of Bihar’s Assembly elections begins today. Here is a look at the constituencies going to polls and elector demographics.

title: Jammu and Kashmir bypolls: Over 65% turnout recorded till 3 p.m. in Nagrota
content: Polling began at 7 a.m. in bone-chilling cold as the valley witnessed sub-zero night temperatures at most places

title: Delhi Red Fort blast: Pulwama doctor was occupant of car that exploded, forensic report awaited
content: Police have collected DNA samples and the forensic report on the nature of explosives used is awaited

title: SC hearing on SIR updates: Supreme Court issues notice on SIR petitions; requests HCs to defer hearings
content: Supreme Court Bench, Kapil Sibal, and Prashant Bhushan debate timing, data privacy, and the Election Commission’s powers while hearing multiple petitions challenging the EC's special intensive revision of electoral rolls

title: Polling for Dampa Assembly seat underway, 34.38% turnout recorded till 11 a.m.
content: The bypoll was necessitated following the death of incumbent MNF legislator Lalrintluanga Sailo in July.

title: Red Fort blast: Delhi Police detains vehicle's owner in Gurugram
content: The police have detained the car's owner, identified as Md Salman, in Haryana’s Gurugram. Salman had sold his car to a person in Okhla, the official said, adding that the car was registered in his name and had a Haryana registration number plate.

title: Watch: Red Fort blast: FIR filed under UAPA as cities placed on high alert
content: Delhi Police registered an FIR under the UAPA and Explosives Act after the car blast near the Red Fort on November 10 killed nine people. Following the explosion, major cities including Mumbai, Bengaluru, and Chandigarh were placed on high alert as security tightened nationwide.

title: Police verification for passports must be completed within four weeks: Allahabad HC
content: The court observed that the passport delay is a hurdle to the right to travel and that ‘any delay in such administrative functions should be strictly avoided unless justified by exceptional circumstances’

title: PM Modi arrives in Bhutan for two day visit
content: PM Modi was received at the Paro International Airport by Bhutanese Prime Minister Tshering Tobgay. “I join the entire nation in welcoming my elder brother, Prime Minister @narendramodi, to Bhutan,” PM Tobgay said in an X post

title: Accepting GST was a blunder, Centre taking away ‘all the money’, says Mamata
content: While the Chief Minister has accused the Centre of a “step-motherly” treatment and said that pending dues were not being released, this was the first time she has said that accepting GST was a “blunder”

title: What is the role of a pay commission? | Explained
content: How have public sector compensation systems evolved over decades? When was the first Central Pay Commission constituted? What are the different terms of reference? What are international practices? How can the government attract and retain talent?

title: Voting begins for bypolls to eight Assembly seats across six States, one Union Territory
content: By-elections are being held in Jammu and Kashmir’s Budgam and Nagrota, Rajasthan’s Anta, Jharkhand’s Ghatshila, Telangana’s Jubilee Hills, Punjab’s Tarn Taran, Mizoram’s Dampa, and Odisha’s Nuapada constituencies

title: Jubilee Hills Bypoll: 47.16% voter turnout till 5 p.m.; drones deployed for aerial surveillance of polling stations
content: The bypoll in the constituency no 61 of Telangana Legislative Assembly has been necessitated due to the death of Bharat Rashtra Samithi MLA Maganti Gopinath

title: Angola agreed to partner with India in ‘critical’ areas during President Murmu's visit: Official
content: He said the discussions reiterated the commitment to "encourage private sector...and private sector (was) playing a big and important role in advancing India, Angola ties of friendship and cooperation"

title: Bihar Assembly elections Phase 2 voting LIVE: Over 67% turnout at 5 p.m.
content: In the first phase of polling held for 121 constituencies in 18 districts on November 6, the State had recorded its highest voting percentage ever in history with 64.66% turnout

title: Deputy CM Udhayanidhi Stalin launches scheme to honour senior citizens on behalf of temples
content: Udhayanidhi Stalin also inaugurated 12 dwelling units constructed at a total cost of ₹3.40 crore meant for officials of the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowments (HR&CE) department.

title: J&K’s by-polls will be a verdict on Omar Abdullah government’s one-year tenure
content: The other factors working against Omar Abdullah in this election are also anti-incumbency and the opposition Peoples Democratic Party’s (PDP) deliberate bid to build its narrative around the government’s failure to deliver in the past one year

title: India airlifts 197 citizens who worked in Myanmar cybercrime hub from Thailand
content: The Indian embassy in Thailand said Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul came to Mae Sot to oversee the operation; Mr. Charnvirakul had expressed his government’s determination to stem the cyber fraud centres of Myanmar

title: Abhishek Banerjee extends support to same-sex couple who married in the Sundarbans
content: He has also promised development and support for the village and villagers who extended their support to the young couple who were abandoned by their families

title: Karnataka government to employ tech professionals at prevailing market wages to adapt to technological advances
content: As many as 39 highly skilled tech persons are to be hired for the new in-house Kaveri Technical Cell, which will pilot the future additions to the Kaveri console or even redevelop Kaveri software as per needs

title: Probing all angles: Home Minister Amit Shah on Delhi blast
content: “We are investigating from all angles. It is difficult to say what caused the incident,” Amit Shah said

title: Concern raised over proposed wind farm near Greater Flamingo Sanctuary in Dhanushkodi
content: Both activists and local fishing community representatives have asked the Tamil Nadu Coastal Zone Management Authority to reconsider CRZ clearance for the project

title: India ready to become self-reliant, future-ready, globally influential by 2047: Abhay Karandikar, Secretary, Department of Science & Technology
content: India is the second largest deployer of 5G over IPv6 in the world and now has a vibrant 6G research ecosystem

title: Houses inundated in Kochi as KWA twin-chamber tank bursts
content: Compound walls collapsed and were washed away as the over four-decade-old tank breached, sending water gushing into nearby houses and damaging household equipment and vehicles; water supply to nearly 30% of areas within Corpn. affected

title: Weekend SIR drive a success as 3,05,780 voters in Ernakulam receive enumeration forms
content: A total of 6,27,009 forms have been distributed in the district till Nov. 9, accounting for 23.63% of the total voters

title: Red Fort blast | ‘Saw people being blown to pieces’: eyewitnesses recount trail of horror
content: Shoppers, taxi drivers and shopkeepers, who helped rescue the wounded and rush them to hospital, recall witnessing body parts and vehicle debris scattered around; our buildings shook, windows rattled, say Chandni Chowk’s residents; so severe was the impact that many felt it over a km away

title: Analysis of candidates of constituencies from Phase 2 of the Bihar Assembly Elections 2025
content: Out of 1,297 candidates analysed by the Association for Democratic Reforms, 415 candidates (32%) have declared criminal cases against themselves

title: How to watch ESPN amid Disney-YouTube TV blackout
content: the blackout affects ABC, the ESPN networks, the Disney-branded channels, Freeform, the FX networks and the Xfinity network . the conflict affects the channel's ability to carry Disney programming . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services including Cox, Dish, DirecTV, Fios, Fubo, Hulu + Live TV, Mediacom, Optimum, Sling, Spectrum TV and

title: CFP Bubble Watch: Who's in? Who's out? Who's close ahead of the second ranking?
content: the college football playoff selection committee will have three main questions to answer . the answer will impact teams ranked 9-12 . teams labeled Still in the mix haven't been eliminated, but have work to do .

title: A drawn knife, an escape by train, a decorated military figure and Georgia Tech's first win
content: the first lieutenant, 33, arrived on horseback to the campus in the fall of 1893 . he registered as a "sub-apprentice" in a woodworking course so he could qualify . any aspirations of becoming a master craftsman, though, were secondary .

title: NWSL: Gotham FC dumps KC Current; Spirit advance
content: the semifinalists are the last four league champions: the Orlando Pride , NJ/NY Gotham FC , Portland Thorns and Washington Spirit . the league that practically trademarked chaos outdid itself with two stoppage-time equalizers, three extra-time matches and an upset of the best team in league history .

title: Bobby Marks' NBA Contract Year All-Stars: Reaves, Lakers lead 12-man lineup
content: the 2025-26 season is just three weeks old, and there are more than six months until the start of free agency . the court should not dissuade us from identifying 12 potential free agents who have stood out and what their future could hold with their respective teams . there are criteria to how we selected our lineup of contract-year All-Stars .

title: Projecting the CFP top 12: Who's No. 2?
content: the selection committee will reveal its second of six rankings on Tuesday night . it will be the first loss of the season to be no. 2 on Tuesday . a deeper dive into the statistics and résumés of both undefeated teams will factor into their discussions .

title: Passan's perfect move for 21 MLB teams that could go big this offseason
content: a deluge of moves is coming between now and the new year . there are caveats: at least one team on this list will sign multiple players . some players who could be on here are a stretch because of budgets .

title: Tiering all 32 NFL teams by their playoff chances
content: team strength, injuries, tiebreakers, future strength of schedule and more can shift odds up or down . ESPN analytics writer seth Walder broke down all 32 teams into nine tiers of playoff hopes . the tier is based on information from ESPN's Football Power Index (FPI), betting lines , performance metrics, health status and some instinct .

title: Winners and losers: Taylor, Henderson shine; Jefferson, Darnold struggle
content: RB, Indianapolis colts : Jonathan Taylor scored 49.6 fantasy points . he tied for 36th on the all-time single-game list . the rushing score in the fourth quarter rallied his team from behind .

title: Free agent pickups: Key additions to fuel your playoff hunt
content: the 10th Sunday of the season began with an exciting overtime affair in Germany . in the late afternoon, the Los Angeles Rams QB Matthew Stafford tossed four TD passes for a record third consecutive game . the team is still waiting for WR Garrett Wilson and Chicago Bears WR DJ Moore to score a fantasy point .

title: 🏈 College Football Power Ranks: 3 newcomers
content: Texas Tech is a legit threat for the college football playoff . but each squad has areas that can be sharpened for the stretch run . even teams much higher in the rankings, such as Oregon and Vanderbilt , came away from narrow wins with areas to clean up .

title: Solak's Week 10 lessons: What now for Brian Daboll, plus the 2024 QB class
content: the Giants fired coach Brian Daboll after 61 games at the helm . daboll's Giants are 2-8 for the third consecutive season and end 20-40-1 under his tenure . the most interesting headline to come out of the firing is that general manager Joe Schoen is keeping his job . every Tuesday, I'll spin the previous week of NFL action forward .

title: Notre Dame-Pitt, Texas-Georgia and betting lines for every top-25 team
content: Notre Dame and Pittsburgh will start at noon ET, in a showdown of ranked opponents . Pitt has been the no. 11 passing offense since turning to Mason Heintschel at QB . in the big Ten, Iowa travels to face USC, while the SEC will feature Oklahoma - Alabama and Georgia .
